TopicTitle: Mk1 Lander Cans Are Messing Up MechJeb? Help??

Articles.Content:
I tried removing the lander cans, and mechjeb flys the rocket to orbit, with the lander cans it goes straight sideways and crashes. I tried flying without MechJeb and it flys fine with the pods on...

How can I fix this...? I kinda want to keep the cans on the rocket. 

Screenshot:

[![screenshot24.jpg](http://s30.postimg.org/6l162klgd/screenshot24.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/6l162klgd/)

> 
> I tried removing the lander cans, and mechjeb flys the rocket to orbit, with the lander cans it goes straight sideways and crashes. I tried flying without MechJeb and it flys fine with the pods on...
> How can I fix this...? I kinda want to keep the cans on the rocket. 
> 
> Screenshot:
> 
> [http://s30.postimg.org/6l162klgd/screenshot24.jpg](http://s30.postimg.org/6l162klgd/screenshot24.jpg)

It's possible it's controlling from one of the lander cans. Before you launch, right click on your mechjeb unit and select "control from here".

If that doesn't work, try a fairing.

> 
> It's possible it's controlling from one of the lander cans. Before you launch, right click on your mechjeb unit and select "control from here".
> If that doesn't work, try a fairing.

THANK YOU!

I tried a fairing before I made the post, still didnt work...

But I "Control from here" and it worked !!!

> 
> THANK YOU!
> I tried a fairing before I made the post, still didnt work...
> 
> But I "Control from here" and it worked !!!

Quite welcome ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
